mapper.insert: insert into tb_drug(drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price) values(#{drugName}, #{drugTradeName}, #{drugNo}, #{drugUnit}, #{drugPrice})
mapper.select: select drug_id, drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price from tb_drug where drug_name = #{drugName} and is_deleted = 0
select drug_id, drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price from tb_drug where drug_id = #{drugId} and is_deleted = 0

select drug_id, drug_name, drug_trade_name, drug_no, drug_unit, drug_price, create_time from tb_drug where is_deleted = 0 order by drug_id desc
limit #{start},#{limit}
select count(*) from tb_drug where is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: update tb_drug set is_deleted = 1 where drug_id = #{drugId} and is_deleted = 0
